achievements.name: Quickdraw
achievements.description: Close an issue or PR within 5 minutes of opening
achievements.speedrun_method: Open an issue with gh issue create, immediately close with gh issue close

achievements.name: YOLO
achievements.description: Merge a pull request without code review
achievements.speedrun_method: Create branch, push, open PR, merge immediately without requesting review

achievements.name: Pull Shark
achievements.description: Open pull requests that get merged
achievements.speedrun_method: Create branches with meaningful files, open PRs, merge. Self-merges count.
gotchas: Tier upgrades may take hours/days to propagate
All PRs count including self-merges on own repos

achievements.name: Galaxy Brain
achievements.description: Get accepted answers on Q&A discussions
achievements.speedrun_method: Enable discussions, have others ask Q&A questions, answer them, mark as accepted
gotchas: Someone else must create the question
You can mark any answer as accepted if you own the repo
No longer earnable in GitHub Community Discussions (only repo discussions)

achievements.name: Pair Extraordinaire
achievements.description: Co-author commits in merged pull requests
achievements.speedrun_method: Add 'Co-authored-by: Name <email>' trailer to commits in merged PRs
gotchas: Co-author email MUST map to a real GitHub account
The PR must be merged, not just committed

achievements.name: Starstruck
achievements.description: Have a repository with many stars
achievements.speedrun_method: Build something useful, share on social media/Reddit/HN
gotchas: Stars must be on a single repo, not aggregated

achievements.name: Public Sponsor
achievements.description: Sponsor an open source contributor via GitHub Sponsors
achievements.speedrun_method: Find a developer with lowest tier ($1-2/month), sponsor via GitHub Sponsors
gotchas: Badge may disappear if sponsorship is cancelled

achievements.name: Arctic Code Vault Contributor
achievements.description: Contributed code to the 2020 GitHub Archive Program
achievements.reason: One-time event from 2020 Arctic Code Vault archive in Svalbard, Norway

achievements.name: Mars 2020 Contributor
achievements.description: Contributed code to repos used in Mars 2020 Helicopter Mission
achievements.reason: Historical one-time event linked to JPL Mars Helicopter

achievements.name: Heart On Your Sleeve
achievements.description: React to something on GitHub with a heart emoji
achievements.reason: Being beta tested, not yet publicly available

achievements.name: Open Sourcerer
achievements.description: Have PRs merged in multiple public repositories
achievements.reason: Being beta tested, not yet publicly available

profile_badges.name: Security Bug Bounty Hunter
profile_badges.how: Participate in GitHub Security bounty program

profile_badges.name: Campus Expert
profile_badges.how: Join GitHub Campus Expert program (students only)

profile_badges.how: Submit accepted advisory to GitHub Advisory Database
